entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Fog patches. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
